data.title: Jerry Miller, Lyle Brewer & Big Sandy: Have Twang Will Travel
data.meta_description:
Jerry Miller & Big Sandy
dkQfO_fr5SQ

Lyle Brewer (Sarah Borges) and Jerry Miller (Eilen Jewell) - Jammin'
lo6c_MxMJeo
gCcRPxVFBE4
n0Y4LjjHIA0
data.text:
is that Jerry Miller who used to play around the Bay Area with Moby Grape

No this is Jerry Miller from Boston...

The Spurs - Go, Boy, Go!

The Spurs - Stop & Let Me Drink About It

The Spurs - The Hawaiian Punch Drunk Polka

The Coachmen - The Nitro Express

The Fathoms - Fathom This

This Jerry Miller is currently playing with Eilen Jewell (saw them in Portland ME last Thursday, and got to talk to him a bit afterwards). If you like this stuff take a look at some of Eilen's youtube videos. They feature Jerry.

A standard part of an Eilen show is a cover of Billy Kidd and the Pirate's "shakin all over - at the end Jerry gets as much time as he wants to show off a bit - similar to Bill Kirchen's "hot rod lincoln" thing.

If you are really into it, there are also youtube videos of him sitting in with Los Straightjackets from when they toured with Eilen last year.
